mapper.insert: insert into SKYPG.TBLCORP_CHARGE (CORP_ID, SITE_CD, CHG_NM, CHG_TYPE, CHG_DESC, CHG_SEQ, JOB_GRD, REG_ID, CHG_TEL1, CHG_TEL2, CHG_TEL3, CHG_EMAIL, CHG_MOB1, CHG_MOB2, CHG_MOB3, JOB_GRD_NM) values (#{corpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{siteCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chgNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chgType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chgDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chgSeq,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{jobGrd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chgTel1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chgTel2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chgTel3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chgEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chgMob1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chgMob2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chgMob3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobGrdNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select CORP_ID, SITE_CD, CHG_NM, CHG_TYPE, CHG_DESC, CHG_SEQ, JOB_GRD, REG_ID, CHG_TEL1, CHG_TEL2, CHG_TEL3, CHG_EMAIL, CHG_MOB1, CHG_MOB2, CHG_MOB3, JOB_GRD_NM from SKYPG.TBLCORP_CHARGE
